courseSectionInformation: 4 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. Prerequisite: FSHN 340 and credit or concurrent registration in FSHN 442.
description: Advanced application of food production and management principles to specific food service demands; emphasis on artistry in preparation, serving, and merchandising high quality food in quantity. 4 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. Prerequisite: FSHN 340 and credit or concurrent registration in FSHN 442.
label: Management of Fine Dining
